page.title: 12People
page.content: The present{Mayor}is the 11th mayor of Calderdale.Each mayor is elected by the members of the political party to which s/he belongs.This is done by a ballot.The mayor holds office for one year.On average,per week,the mayor attends 6 events,from meetings to openings etc. At the moment,the{M.P}of HALIFAX is a Conservative.He is called Roy Galley. His job is a hard one,because it comprises of meeting people,going to different towns,including London to attend Parliament. {SHIRLEY CRABTREE}(Big Daddy)was born in Wilson Street,Halifax.At school his favourite subject was sport.He started wrestling when he was 9 years old.He left Halifax but returned in 1969.His greatest ambition is to get fit and healthy,and to give people pleasure as he wrestles.
